page.title: 02Trips, Talks and Visits
page.content: During our study of the 12sq.km we had a number of talks, trips and visits. We had a talk on the history of our study block, by {Commander Gammon}. A talk and visit about the nature of our area, by {Mr John Breeds}.Two talks on{salmon} in the rivers {Taw {and Torridge,}by {Mr Roger Bickley } and we went for a walk with {Mr Roger {Harding}about the conservation on the{ {Burrows, Marshes }and {Horsey Island.} All these trips, talks and visits were very intresting and gave us all alot of information for this project that we could not have found in any books.{ {Commander Gammon }is a local historion of Braunton and the area around the village.{Mr John Breeds}is a warden one of not very many on {Braunton {Burrows. Mr Roger Bickley}is a water ballif on the rivers {Taw and {Torridge. }
